com.activities.am1
Class ListPublicQuestionActivity

java.lang.Object
  ListActivity
      com.activities.am1.ListPublicQuestionActivity

public class ListPublicQuestionActivity
extends ListActivity

ListPublicQuestionActivity Activity class in which generic user can choose to ask a new question or to show old questions Created on November 18, 2012

Author:
Valentina Pontillo v.pontillo@studenti.unina.it

Constructor Summary
ListPublicQuestionActivity()
           
 
Method Summary
 void manageButton(View v)
          This method permits to pass to a new activity (AddQuestionActivity) when the user press on a button Add Question
 void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
          Default method to create an activity in which is configured the listener for the button buttonAskQuestion on click event The list of question is passed to the adapter and the latter is passed to the view
 boolean onKeyDown(int keyCode, KeyEvent event)
          Ask to the user if he/she is sure to leave the application
 void onListItemClick(ListView l, View v, int position, long id)
          This method permits to show a specific question when a general user click on item (a question) of the adapted list (only two field: nome of the course and title of the question)

Method Detail

onCreate

public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
Default method to create an activity in which is configured the listener for the button buttonAskQuestion on click event The list of question is passed to the adapter and the latter is passed to the view

savedInstanceState - Bundle

onListItemClick

public void onListItemClick(ListView l,
                            View v,
                            int position,
                            long id)
This method permits to show a specific question when a general user click on item (a question) of the adapted list (only two field: nome of the course and title of the question)

Parameters:
l - ListView
v - View
position - int
id - long
